title: learn cryptic
description: is a daily game to for people who want to learn about or get better at solving cryptic crossword clues.

title: blood lines
description: is a 3D visualizer for genealogical data. It allows users to upload GEDCOM files as well as explore some of my favorite family tree examples.

title: snl timeline
description: is an interactive timeline of SNL seasons. It focus on the chaning cast members, behind-the-scenes goings-ons and public perception of SNL over the decades.

title: trans rights tracker
description: is a trans rights legislation tracker I made for a non-profit group. They had been working on building up a database of anti-trans legislation in the US for four years. When I began they were using AirTables to explore the data.

title: soil
description: is an interactive map of my travels around the world.

title: the drain
description: is a horror game made in JavaScript.

title: vinyl
description: is a digital catalog of my vinyl record collection.

title: ...pay-shun
description: is an album of original music I made between 2008 - 2013.

title: moving shadow
description: is a CSS library for adding dynamic text-shadows. On mobile these respond to device orientation and on desktop to mouse position.

title: photography
description: is a collection of some favorite sights I have captured.

title: neon
description: is a CSS library for creating neon light effects.

title: go papago
description: is an EP by my band Hot Noise, from 2012.

title: reels
description: is a language translator for movie titles. It relies on The Movie Database Open API.

title: visual art
description: is a collection of visual art I have made over the years.

title: pulp
description: is a catalog of every book I have read for pleasure.

title: the dude abides
description: is the first JavaScript project I gave myself.
